revision.text:
<!--국가원수_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = President
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 원래 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국가 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 취임일 | ontologyProperty = activeYearsStartDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 퇴임일 | ontologyProperty = activeYearsEndDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 부통령 | ontologyProperty = vicePresident }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국적 | ontologyProperty = nationality }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출생일 | ontologyProperty = birthDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출생지 | ontologyProperty = birthPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망일 | ontologyProperty = deathDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망지 | ontologyProperty = deathPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 거주지 | ontologyProperty = restingPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 정당 | ontologyProperty = party }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 종교 | ontologyProperty = religion }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 배우자 | ontologyProperty = spouse }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 자녀 | ontologyProperty = child }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 부모 | ontologyProperty = parent }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 전임 | ontologyProperty = predecessor }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 후임 | ontologyProperty = successor }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 웹사이트 | ontologyProperty = foaf:homepage }}
end}}

<!-- Not Yet Mapping
|명칭        = 
|국기연도   = 
|대수        = 
|부통령 명칭 = 
|학력        = 
|전임 대수   = 
|후임 대수   = 
-->
